docs.snippet: The Rays, with two home runs by Ryan Roberts, hammered the Yankees and C.C. Sabathia, who was throwing right into the hitting zones of the Rays’ right-handed hitters....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Rays, with two home runs by Ryan Roberts, hammered the Yankees and C.C. Sabathia, who was throwing right into the hitting zones of the Rays’ right-handed hitters.
docs.abstract: Tampa Bay Rays defeat New York Yankees, 5-1.

headline.main: Rays’ Light Hitters Show Pop Against Sabathia While Yankees’ Bats Fizzle

Boston Red Sox defeats Oakland Athletics, 9-6.

docs.abstract: Uli Hoeness, former German soccer champion, turns himself in to Munich prosecutors for keeping a secret Swiss bank account to evade taxes; faces up to 10 years in prison.

docs.snippet: After getting off to a slow start, the defending Stanley Cup champion Los Angeles Kings have a chance to hold home-ice advantage in a postseason series for the first time since 1992....
docs.lead_paragraph: After getting off to a slow start, the defending Stanley Cup champion Los Angeles Kings have a chance to hold home-ice advantage in a postseason series for the first time since 1992.
docs.abstract: Los Angeles Kings have improved their defense and detail in recent weeks, pushing them from a competitive club to a potential Stanley Cup contender.

headline.seo: Los Angeles Kings Peaking Again in Time for Postseason
headline.main: Kings Seek Repeat of Late-Season Magic
